EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar! Find out how the non-traditional branch is becoming the norm
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Maintaining good branch experiences as customer demands change means financial institutions (FIs) are constantly on a journey to transform. The traditional branch model is evolving. And non-traditional branch models are emerging that give greater convenience to the customer, migrate more transactions to self-service, and take the branch to places it’s never been before! Meeting customers outside the traditional branch – where they live, work, play, shop — may seem unusual but it’s hitting the mark with customers. And it’s helping banks attract new customers and grow existing relationships without the typical branch labour, technology and real estate overhead.
